</td></tr></tbody></table>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 0px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000" title="Template:AMD Radeon RX 6000"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon RX 6000"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-220"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-221"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_221-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-222"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_222-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-223"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_223-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-224"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_224-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray Accelerators</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Mobile_GPUs">Mobile GPUs</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=42" title="Edit section: Mobile GPUs">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Such chips are either soldered to the mainboard or to some <a href="/wiki/Mobile_PCI_Express_Module" title="Mobile PCI Express Module">Mobile PCI Express Module (MXM)</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Rage_Mobility_series">Rage Mobility series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=43" title="Edit section: Rage Mobility series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Mobility_Radeon_HD_5000_series">Mobility Radeon HD 5000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=50" title="Edit section: Mobility Radeon HD 5000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_6000M_series">Radeon HD 6000M series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=51" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 6000M series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_252-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-253"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_253-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-254"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_254-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single Precision performance is calculated from the core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-255"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_255-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_6000.29_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_6000)_2">IGP (HD 6000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=52" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 6000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models feature the UNB/MC <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Computer_bus" title="Computer bus">Bus</a> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/I/O_interface" title="I/O interface">interface</a></li>
<li>All models do <b>not</b> feature double-precision FP</li>
<li>All models feature Angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3, and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li></ul>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[ <span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn't work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span> ] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Ultra-mobile)"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Ultra-mobile) (page does not exist)"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">

</li>

<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_6000G.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_6000G)">IGP (HD 6000G)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=53" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 6000G)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models include <a href="/wiki/Direct3D" title="Direct3D">Direct3D</a> 11, <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 4.4 and <a href="/wiki/OpenCL" title="OpenCL">OpenCL</a> 1.2</li>
<li>All models feature the UNB/MC <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Computer_bus" title="Computer bus">Bus</a> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/I/O_interface" title="I/O interface">interface</a></li>
<li>All models do not feature double-precision FP</li>
<li>All models feature Angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3 and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li>
<li>All models feature VLIW5</li></ul>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 80%; text-align:center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Released
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Code name
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Fabrication_process" title="Fabrication process">Fab</a> (nm)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core Clock (MHz)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core config<sup>1</sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a>
</th>
<th colspan="3">Shared Memory
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Processing power<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/GFLOPS" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Max. Combined TDP<sup>2</sup> (Watts)
</th>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_7000M_series">Radeon HD 7000M series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=54" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 7000M series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_7000_series" title="Radeon HD 7000 series">Radeon HD 7000 series</a></div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[ <span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxxM&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. </li>

</li>
</ol></div></div>

<td><span data-sort-value="000000002013-01-08-0000" style="white-space:nowrap">8 January 2013</span>
</td>
<td>1280:80:32
</td>
<td>850<br/><i>900</i>
</td>
<td>27.2<br/><i>28.8</i>
</td>
<td>68<br/><i>72</i>
</td>
<td>2304
</td>
<td>GDDR5<br/>256
</td>
<td>2<br/>4
</td>
<td>1200
</td>
<td>153.6
</td>
<td>100
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-271"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-272"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_272-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-273"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_273-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-274"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_274-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-275"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_275-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/GDDR5" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-276"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_276-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-282"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-283"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_283-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-284"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_284-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-285"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_285-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_286-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx M4xx"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx M4xx (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-290"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-291"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_291-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-292"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_292-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-293"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_293-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-294"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_294-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-310"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-311"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_311-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-312"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_312-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-313"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_313-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-314"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_314-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_RX_5000M_series">Radeon RX 5000M series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=62" title="Edit section: Radeon RX 5000M series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 0px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M" title="Template:AMD Radeon RX 6000M"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon RX 6000M"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-order-353"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-order_353-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Ordering for names is based on CU count followed by clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-boost-354"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-355"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_355-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-356"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_356-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-357"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_357-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-358"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_358-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray Accelerators</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shaders</a> : <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping unit</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
<br/><sup>2</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping unit</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a> : Compute Units
<br/><sup>2</sup> The effective data transfer rate of <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/GDDR5" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory
<br/><sup>3</sup>  Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Support for Fire Pro Cards with Terascale 2 and later by firepro driver 15.301.2601<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-405"><a href="#cite_note-405">[269]</a></sup>
</p>

<h3><span id="FirePro_Workstation_series_.28Wx000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Workstation_series_(Wx000)">FirePro Workstation series (Wx000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=70" title="Edit section: FirePro Workstation series (Wx000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-0"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">[275]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-0"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">[276]</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-0"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_D-Series">FirePro D-Series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=71" title="Edit section: FirePro D-Series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<table class="box-Expand_section plainlinks metadata ambox mbox-small-left ambox-content" role="presentation"><tbody><tr><td class="mbox-image"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg"><img alt="[icon]" data-file-height="31" data-file-width="44" decoding="async" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/20px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/30px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png 2x" width="20"/></a></td><td class="mbox-text"><div class="mbox-text-span">This section <b>needs expansion</b>. You can help by <a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=">adding to it</a>.  <span class="date-container"><i>(<span class="date">June 2019</span>)</i></span></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>In 2014, AMD released the D-Series specifically for <a href="/wiki/Mac_Pro" title="Mac Pro">Mac Pro</a> workstations.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-421"><a href="#cite_note-421">[285]</a></sup>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a> : compute units
</p>
<h3><span id="FirePro_Workstation_series_.28Wx100.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Workstation_series_(Wx100)">FirePro Workstation series (Wx100)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=72" title="Edit section: FirePro Workstation series (Wx100)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-1"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">[275]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-1"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">[276]</a></sup> OpenCL 2.1 and 2.2 possible for all OpenCL 2.0-Cards with Driver Update in Future (Khronos). Linux Support for OpenCL is limited with AMDGPU Driver 16.60 actual to Version 1.2.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-amd.com1_425-0"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com1-425">[289]</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-1"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a> : compute units
<br/><sup>2</sup> The effective data transfer rate of <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/GDDR5" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.
<br/><sup>3</sup> OpenGL 4.4: support with AMD FirePro driver release 14.301.000 or later, in footnotes of specs<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-amd.com_420-1"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com-420">[284]</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="FirePro_Workstation_series_.28Wx300.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Workstation_series_(Wx300)">FirePro Workstation series (Wx300)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=73" title="Edit section: FirePro Workstation series (Wx300)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-2"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro_WX_x100">Radeon Pro WX x100</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=74" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro WX x100">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>4th Quarter 2016 Launch by AMD
</p>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">Main article: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Pro" title="AMD Radeon Pro">AMD Radeon Pro</a></div>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-3"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-435"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-436"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_436-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-437"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_437-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-438"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_438-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-439"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_439-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Double-440"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Double_440-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">To calculate driver enabled FP64 processing power see <a href="/wiki/Radeon_Pro#Driver" title="Radeon Pro">driver</a>.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Vega_series">Radeon Vega series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=75" title="Edit section: Radeon Vega series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_Pro#Radeon_Vega_Frontier_Edition" title="Radeon Pro">Radeon Pro § Radeon Vega Frontier Edition</a></div>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-4"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Vega_Frontier_Edition" title="Template:AMD Radeon Vega Frontier Edition"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Vega_Frontier_Edition" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Vega Frontier Edition"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Vega_Frontier_Edition&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Codename" title="Codename">Codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br/>(<a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br/>Die Size
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-boost_469-0"><a href="#cite_note-boost-469">[a]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-texture_fill_470-0"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-470">[b]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_471-0"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-471">[c]</a></sup>
</th>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-469"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-470"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_470-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-471"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_471-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-472"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_472-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-473"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_473-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<li id="cite_note-boost-484"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-485"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_485-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-486"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_486-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-487"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_487-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-488"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_488-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-490"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_490-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-491"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_491-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-492"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_492-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-fixed-494"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-7"><sup><i><b>h</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-8"><sup><i><b>i</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shader</a> : <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a>: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-unified-504"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-507"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_507-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-508"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_508-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-509"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_509-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-510"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_510-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro">Radeon Pro</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=81" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">Main article: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Pro" title="AMD Radeon Pro">AMD Radeon Pro</a></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro_WX_mobile_series">Radeon Pro WX mobile series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=82" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro WX mobile series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Half Precision Power (FP16) is equal single precision power (FP32) in 4th GCN Generation (in 5th Gen: Half Precision (FP16) = 2x SP (FP32))</li></ul>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-536"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-537"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_537-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-538"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_538-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-539"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_539-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-540"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_540-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> : Compute Units </span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series" title="Template:AMD Radeon Pro 500 Series"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Pro 500 Series (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-561"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-562"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_562-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-563"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_563-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-564"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_564-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-565"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_565-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series" title="Template:AMD Radeon Pro 5000M Series"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Pro 5000M Series (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-584"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-585"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_585-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-586"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_586-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-587"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_587-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-588"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_588-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a> : compute units

</p>
<h3><span id="FirePro_Server_series_.28S000x.2FSxx_000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Server_series_(S000x/Sxx_000)">FirePro Server series (S000x/Sxx 000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=90" title="Edit section: FirePro Server series (S000x/Sxx 000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-2"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">[275]</a></sup> OpenGL 4.5 was only in Windows available.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-2"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">[276]</a></sup> Actual Linux Driver support OpenGL 4.5 and Vulkan 1.0, but only OpenCL 1.2 by AMDGPU Driver 16.60.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-amd.com1_425-1"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com1-425">[289]</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-5"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">[277]</a></sup></li></ul>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Instinct" title="Template:AMD Radeon Instinct"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Instinct&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Instinct (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Instinct&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-636"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-637"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_637-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <i>texture mapping units</i> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-638"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_638-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <i>render output units</i> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-639"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_639-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-640"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_640-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br/>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a> : compute units

</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Console_GPUs">Console GPUs</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=94" title="Edit section: Console GPUs">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center">
<caption>
</caption>
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2" style="width:9em">Code Name (Console Model)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2">GPU Code Name and/or Architecture
</th>
<th rowspan="2" style="width: 7em;"><a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a> <br/> (nm)
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Transistor_count" title="Transistor count">Transistors</a> <br/> (million)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core config<sup>1</sup>,<sup>2</sup>,<sup>4</sup>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core clock (MHz)
</th>
<th colspan="4"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a>
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray-tracing</a> Performance
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Machine_learning" title="Machine learning">ML</a> Performance
</th>
<th colspan="5">Memory
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus interface
</th>
<th colspan="3"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Application_programming_interface" title="Application programming interface">API</a> compliance (version)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Processing power<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/GFLOPS" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Architecture features

<td>raytracing, FidelityFX Super Resolution (FSR), 8k resolution at 60 Hz or 4k resolution at 120 Hz (dock mode)
</td></tr>
<tr>

</th>

</th>

</th>

</th>

</th>

</th></tr>
<tr>
<th colspan="4">Fillrate
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray-tracing</a> Performance
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Machine_learning" title="Machine learning">ML</a> Performance
</th>
<th colspan="5">Memory
</th>
<th colspan="3">API compliance (version)
</th></tr></tbody></table>
<p><sup>1</sup> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a> : <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shaders</a> : <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a> : Render output units
<br/>
<sup>2</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a> : Texture mapping units : Render output units <br/>
<sup>4</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a> : Texture mapping units : Render output units : RT Cores
</p><p><sup>3</sup> 12.8 GB/s texture bandwidth. 9.6 GB/s framebuffer and Z-buffer bandwidth.
</p>
<ul><li>The Latte looks similar to the RV730 used in the Radeon HD4650/4670.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-eurogamer.net_686-0"><a href="#cite_note-eurogamer.net-686">[488]</a></sup> Although It's an even closer possibly exact specification match to the HD5550 as it has exactly the same clock, number of Shaders, Texture mapping units &amp; Render Outputs<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-687"><a href="#cite_note-687">[489]</a></sup></li></ul>

<li><a href="/wiki/Apple_M1" title="Apple M1">Apple M1</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Kaby_Lake#List_of_8th_generation_Kaby_Lake_G_processors" title="Kaby Lake">Radeon RX Vega M</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine" title="Video Coding Engine">Video Coding Engine</a>, AMD's equivalent SIP core till 2017</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Video_Core_Next" title="Video Core Next">Video Core Next</a>, AMD's video core which combines the functionality of <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine" title="Video Coding Engine">Video Coding Engine</a> and <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder" title="Unified Video Decoder">Unified Video Decoder</a></li></ul>

<li id="cite_note-ryan_smith_radeon_vii_fp64-191"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-ryan_smith_radeon_vii_fp64_191-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFRyan_Smith_[@RyanSmithAT]2019">Ryan Smith [@RyanSmithAT] (16 January 2019). <a class="external text" href="https://twitter.com/RyanSmithAT/status/1085680805802733568" rel="nofollow">"Alright, I finally have the Radeon VII FP64 performance matter sorted out with AMD. Contrary to earlier statements, it is being throttled. Radeon VII's rate will be 1:8, versus Vega 20's native 1:2 rate. Notably, this is still twice the native FP64 rate of all other Vegas"</a> (Tweet) – via <a href="/wiki/Twitter" title="Twitter">Twitter</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Alright%2C+I+finally+have+the+Radeon+VII+FP64+performance+matter+sorted+out+with+AMD.+Contrary+to+earlier+statements%2C+it+is+being+throttled.+Radeon+VII%27s+rate+will+be+1%3A8%2C+versus+Vega+20%27s+native+1%3A2+rate.+Notably%2C+this+is+still+twice+the+native+FP64+rate+of+all+other+Vegas.&amp;rft.date=2019-01-16&amp;rft.au=Ryan+Smith+%5B%40RyanSmithAT%5D&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FRyanSmithAT%2Fstatus%2F1085680805802733568&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+AMD+graphics+processing+units"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-khronos.org-412"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-khronos.org_412-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-khronos.org_412-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-khronos.org_412-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.khronos.org/conformance/adopters/conformant-products#opengl" rel="nofollow">"The Khronos Group"</a>. <i>Khronos.org</i>. 17 July 2018. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170128195542/https://www.khronos.org/conformance/adopters/conformant-products#opengl" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 28 January 2017<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li><a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Graphics_Core_Next_4" title="Graphics Core Next">Neo</a> (<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PlayStation_4_Pro" title="PlayStation 4 Pro">PlayStation 4 Pro</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Graphics_Core_Next_4" title="Graphics Core Next">Scorpio</a> (<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Xbox_One_X" title="Xbox One X">Xbox One X</a>)</li>

<li><a href="/wiki/Xbox_Series_X_and_Series_S" title="Xbox Series X and Series S">Xbox Series X and Series S</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

	<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading mw-first-heading">List of AMD graphics processing units</h1>
	<div id="bodyContent" class="vector-body">
		<div id="siteSub" class="noprint">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div>
		<div id="contentSub"></div>
		<div id="contentSub2"></div>
		
		<div id="jump-to-nav"></div>
		<a class="mw-jump-link" href="#mw-head">Jump to navigation</a>
		<a class="mw-jump-link" href="#searchInput">Jump to search</a>
		<div id="mw-content-text" class="mw-body-content mw-content-ltr" lang="en" dir="ltr"><div class="mw-parser-output"><p>
The following is a list that contains general information about <a href="/wiki/Graphics_processing_unit" title="Graphics processing unit">GPUs</a> and video cards by <a href="/wiki/Advanced_Micro_Devices" title="Advanced Micro Devices">Advanced Micro Devices</a> (AMD), including those by <a href="/wiki/ATI_Technologies" title="ATI Technologies">ATI Technologies</a> before 2006, based on official specifications in table-form.
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading"><input type="checkbox" role="button" id="toctogglecheckbox" class="toctogglecheckbox" style="display:none" /><div class="toctitle" lang="en" dir="ltr"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Field_explanations">Field explanations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: Field explanations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>The headers in the table listed below describe the following:
</p>
<ul><li><b>Model</b> – The marketing name for the <a href="/wiki/GPU" class="mw-redirect" title="GPU">GPU</a> assigned by <a href="/wiki/AMD" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD">AMD</a>/<a href="/wiki/ATI_Technologies" title="ATI Technologies">ATI</a>. Note that ATI trademarks have been replaced by AMD trademarks starting with the <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_6000_series" title="Radeon HD 6000 series">Radeon HD 6000 series</a> for desktop and <a href="/wiki/AMD_FirePro" title="AMD FirePro">AMD FirePro</a> series for professional graphics.</li>
<li><b>Codename</b> – The internal engineering codename for the GPU.</li>
<li><b>Launch</b> – Date of release for the GPU.</li>
<li><b>Architecture</b> – The <a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">microarchitecture</a> used by the GPU.</li>
<li><b>Fab</b> – Fabrication process. Average feature size of components of the GPU.</li>
<li><b>Transistors</b> – <a href="/wiki/Transistor_count" title="Transistor count">Number</a> of <a href="/wiki/Transistors" class="mw-redirect" title="Transistors">transistors</a> on the die.</li>
<li><b>Die Size</b> – Physical surface area of the die.</li>
<li><b>Core config</b> – The layout of the graphics pipeline, in terms of functional units.</li>
<li><b>Core clock</b> – The reference base and boost (if available) core clock frequency.</li>
<li><b>Fillrate</b>
<ul><li><b>Pixel</b> - The rate at which pixels can be rendered by the raster operators to a display. Measured in Pixels/s.</li>
<li><b>Texture</b> - The rate at which textures can be mapped by the texture mapping units onto a polygon mesh. Measured in Texels/s.</li></ul></li>
<li><b>Performance</b>
<ul><li><b>Shader operations</b> - How many operations the <a href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Pixel shader">pixel shaders</a> (or <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified shader">unified shaders</a> in <a href="/wiki/Direct3D_10" class="mw-redirect" title="Direct3D 10">Direct3D 10</a> and newer GPUs) can perform. Measured in Operations/s.</li>
<li><b>Vertex operations</b> - The amount of geometry operations that can be processed on the vertex shaders in one second (only applies to Direct3D 9.0c and older GPUs). Measured in Vertices/s.</li></ul></li>
<li><b>Memory</b>
<ul><li><b>Bus type</b> – Type of memory bus utilized.</li>
<li><b>Bus width</b> – Maximum bit width of the memory bus utilized.</li>
<li><b>Size</b> – Size of the graphics memory.</li>
<li><b>Clock</b> – The reference memory <a href="/wiki/Clock_frequency" class="mw-redirect" title="Clock frequency">clock frequency</a>.</li>
<li><b>Bandwidth</b> – Maximum theoretical <a href="/wiki/Memory_bandwidth" title="Memory bandwidth">memory bandwidth</a> based on bus type and width.</li></ul></li>
<li><b>TDP (<a href="/wiki/Thermal_design_power" title="Thermal design power">Thermal design power</a>)</b> – Maximum amount of heat generated by the GPU chip, measured in Watt.</li>
<li><b>TBP (Typical board power)</b> – Typical power drawn by the total board, including power for the GPU chip and peripheral equipment, such as <a href="/wiki/Voltage_regulator_module" title="Voltage regulator module">Voltage regulator module</a>, memory, fans, etc., measured in Watt.</li>
<li><b>Bus interface</b> – Bus by which the graphics processor is attached to the system (typically an expansion slot, such as <a href="/wiki/Conventional_PCI" class="mw-redirect" title="Conventional PCI">PCI</a>, <a href="/wiki/Accelerated_Graphics_Port" title="Accelerated Graphics Port">AGP</a>, or <a href="/wiki/PCIe" class="mw-redirect" title="PCIe">PCIe</a>).</li>
<li><b>API support</b> – Rendering and computing <a href="/wiki/Application_programming_interface" class="mw-redirect" title="Application programming interface">APIs</a> supported by the GPU and driver.</li></ul>
<p><b>Due to conventions changing over time, some numerical definitions such as core config, core clock, performance and memory should not be compared one-to-one across generations. The following tables are for reference use only, and do not reflect actual performance.</b>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Video_codec_acceleration">Video codec acceleration</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Video codec acceleration">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/ATi_Radeon_R100_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="ATi Radeon R100 Series">R100</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Video_Immersion" title="Video Immersion">Video Immersion</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/ATI_Radeon_R200_series" class="mw-redirect" title="ATI Radeon R200 series">R200</a></b> - Video Immersion II</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/ATi_Radeon_R300_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="ATi Radeon R300 Series">R300</a></b> - Video Immersion II + <a href="/wiki/Video_Shader" title="Video Shader">Video Shader</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/ATi_Radeon_R400_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="ATi Radeon R400 Series">R410</a></b> - Video Shader HD</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/ATi_Radeon_R400_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="ATi Radeon R400 Series">R420</a></b> - Video Shader HD + <a href="/wiki/DXVA" class="mw-redirect" title="DXVA">DXVA</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_X1000_series" title="Radeon X1000 series">R520</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Avivo" class="mw-redirect" title="Avivo">Avivo Video</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_2000_series" title="Radeon HD 2000 series">R600</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/ATI_Avivo#ATI_Avivo_HD" title="ATI Avivo">Avivo HD</a> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD/UVD+" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD</a> 1.0</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_4000_series" title="Radeon HD 4000 series">R700</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_2" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 2</a>, UVD 2.2</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_5000_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="Radeon HD 5000 Series">Evergreen</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_2" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 2.2</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_6000_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="Radeon HD 6000 Series">Northern Islands</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_3" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 3</a> (HD 67xx <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_2" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 2.2</a>)</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_7000_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="Radeon HD 7000 Series">Southern Islands</a></b> - UVD 3.1, <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine#VCE_1.0" title="Video Coding Engine">VCE 1.0</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Rx_200_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon Rx 200 series">Sea Islands</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_4" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 4.2</a>, <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine#VCE_2.0" title="Video Coding Engine">VCE 2.0</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Rx_300_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon Rx 300 series">Volcanic Islands</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_5" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 5.0</a>, <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_6" title="Unified Video Decoder">6.0</a>, <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine#VCE_3.0" title="Video Coding Engine">VCE 3.0</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_400_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon 400 series">Arctic Islands</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_6" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 6.3</a>, <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine#VCE_3.0" title="Video Coding Engine">VCE 3.4</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_RX_Vega_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD RX Vega series">Vega</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder#UVD_7" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD 7.0</a>, <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine#VCE_4.0" title="Video Coding Engine">VCE 4.0</a> and <a href="/wiki/Video_Core_Next" title="Video Core Next">VCN 1.0</a> only at <a href="/wiki/AMD_Raven_Ridge" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Raven Ridge">AMD Raven Ridge</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_RX_5000_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon RX 5000 series">Navi 1X</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Video_Core_Next" title="Video Core Next">VCN 2.0</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_RX_6000_series" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon RX 6000 series">Navi 2X</a></b> - <a href="/wiki/Video_Core_Next" title="Video Core Next">VCN 3.0</a></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Features_Overview">Features Overview</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Features Overview">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>
The following table shows features of <a href="/wiki/Advanced_Micro_Devices" title="Advanced Micro Devices">AMD</a>/<a href="/wiki/ATI_Technologies" title="ATI Technologies">ATI</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Graphics_processing_unit" title="Graphics processing unit">GPUs</a> 
</p>
