<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1011085734">.mw-parser-output .reflist{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em;list-style-type:decimal}.mw-parser-output .reflist .references{font-size:100%;margin-bottom:0;list-style-type:inherit}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-2{column-width:30em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-3{column-width:25em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns ol{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-alpha{list-style-type:upper-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-roman{list-style-type:upper-roman}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-alpha{list-style-type:lower-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-greek{list-style-type:lower-greek}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-roman{list-style-type:lower-roman}</style><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-r100_shader-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-r100_shader_1-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The Radeon 100 Series has programmable pixel shaders, but do not fully comply with DirectX 8 or Pixel Shader 1.0. See article on <a href="/wiki/ATi_Radeon_R100_Series#R100&#39;s_pixel_shaders" class="mw-redirect" title="ATi Radeon R100 Series">R100's pixel shaders</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-nonpot-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-nonpot_2-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">R300, R400 and R500 based cards do not fully comply with OpenGL 2+ as the hardware does not support all types of non-power of two (NPOT) textures.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-nofp64-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-nofp64_7-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">OpenGL 4+ compliance requires supporting FP64 shaders and these are emulated on some TeraScale chips using 32-bit hardware.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-vcn-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-vcn_10-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-vcn_10-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-vcn_10-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">The UVD and VCE were replaced by the Video Core Next (VCN) ASIC in the <a href="/wiki/Ryzen#Raven_Ridge" title="Ryzen">Raven Ridge</a> APU implementation of Vega.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FliudMotion-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FliudMotion_12-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Video processing ASIC for video frame rate interpolation technique. In Windows it works as a DirectShow filter in your player. In Linux, there is no support on the part of drivers and / or community.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-DRM-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-DRM_13-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-DRM_13-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">To play protected video content, it also requires card, operating system, driver, and application support. A compatible HDCP display is also needed for this. HDCP is mandatory for the output of certain audio formats, placing additional constraints on the multimedia setup.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-max_displays-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-max_displays_14-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">More displays may be supported with native <a href="/wiki/DisplayPort" title="DisplayPort">DisplayPort</a> connections, or splitting the maximum resolution between multiple monitors with active converters.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-drm-16"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-drm_16-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-drm_16-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">DRM (<a href="/wiki/Direct_Rendering_Manager" title="Direct Rendering Manager">Direct Rendering Manager</a>) is a component of the Linux kernel. <a href="/wiki/AMDgpu_(Linux_kernel_module)" title="AMDgpu (Linux kernel module)">AMDgpu</a> is the Linux kernel module. Support in this table refers to the most current version.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="API_Overview">API Overview</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: API Overview">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>The following table shows the graphics and compute <a href="/wiki/API" title="API">APIs</a> support across AMD GPU micro-architectures. Note that  a branding series might include older generation chips.
</p>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_graphics_API_support&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_graphics_API_support" title="Template:AMD graphics API support"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_graphics_API_support" title="Template talk:AMD graphics API support"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_graphics_API_support&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="3">Chip series
</th>
<th rowspan="3">Micro&#173;architecture
</th>
<th rowspan="3"><a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>
</th>
<th colspan="5">Supported <a href="/wiki/Application_programming_interface" class="mw-redirect" title="Application programming interface">APIs</a>
</th>
<th rowspan="3">AMD support
</th>
<th rowspan="3">Year introduced
</th>
<th rowspan="3">Introduced with
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th colspan="3"><a href="/wiki/Rendering_(computer_graphics)" title="Rendering (computer graphics)">Rendering</a>
</th>
<th colspan="2">Computing / <a href="/wiki/ROCm" title="ROCm">ROCm</a>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th style="width:10em;"><a href="/wiki/Vulkan_(API)" class="mw-redirect" title="Vulkan (API)">Vulkan</a><sup id="cite_ref-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18">&#91;10&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th style="width:10em;"><a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a><sup id="cite_ref-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-19">&#91;11&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th style="width:10em;"><a href="/wiki/Direct3D" title="Direct3D">Direct3D</a>
</th>
<th style="width:10em;"><a href="/wiki/Heterogeneous_System_Architecture" title="Heterogeneous System Architecture">HSA</a>
</th>
<th style="width:10em;"><a href="/wiki/OpenCL" title="OpenCL">OpenCL</a>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th><a href="/wiki/ATI_Wonder_series" title="ATI Wonder series">Wonder</a>
</th>
<td rowspan="6">Fixed-pipeline<sup id="cite_ref-r100_shader_20-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-r100_shader-20">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup>
</td>
<td>1000<span class="nowrap">&#160;</span>nm<br />800<span class="nowrap">&#160;</span>nm
</td>
<td rowspan="15" data-sort-value="" style="background: #ececec; color: #2C2C2C; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na">N/A
</td>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-r100_shader-20"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-r100_shader_20-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Radeon 7000 Series has programmable pixel shaders, but do not fully comply with DirectX 8 or Pixel Shader 1.0. See article on <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R100_series#R100&#39;s_pixel_shaders" title="Radeon R100 series">R100's pixel shaders</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-nonpot-21"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-nonpot_21-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">These series do not fully comply with OpenGL 2+ as the hardware does not support all types of non-power-of-two (NPOT) textures.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-nofp64-23"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-nofp64_23-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">OpenGL 4+ compliance requires supporting FP64 shaders and these are emulated on some TeraScale chips using 32-bit hardware.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><sup id="cite_ref-THWGCN_24-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-THWGCN-24">&#91;13&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-THW_radeon_8000_plans_25-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-THW_radeon_8000_plans-25">&#91;14&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Radeon_VEGA_Frontier_Edition_26-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Radeon_VEGA_Frontier_Edition-26">&#91;15&#93;</a></sup>
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_7000_series">Radeon 7000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: Radeon 7000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R100_series" title="Radeon R100 series">Radeon R100 series</a></div>
<ul><li>All models include Direct3D 7.0 and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 1.3</li>
<li>The R100 cards were originally launched without any numbering as Radeon SDR, DDR, LE and VE; these products were later "rebranded" to their names within the numbered naming scheme, when the <a href="/wiki/List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units#Radeon_8000_&amp;_9000_series" title="List of AMD graphics processing units">Radeon 8000 series</a> was introduced.</li></ul>

<h4><span id="IGP_.283xx_series.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(3xx_series)">IGP (3xx series)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10" title="Edit section: IGP (3xx series)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models are manufactured with a 180&#160;nm fabrication process</li>
<li>All models include Direct3D 7.0 and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 1.3</li>
<li>Based on the Radeon VE</li></ul>

<h3><span id="Radeon_8000_.26_9000_series"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_8000_&amp;_9000_series">Radeon 8000 &amp; 9000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11" title="Edit section: Radeon 8000 &amp; 9000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R200_series" title="Radeon R200 series">Radeon R200 series</a></div>

<li>All models include Direct3D 8.1 and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 1.4</li></ul>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.289000_series.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(9000_series)">IGP (9000 series)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12" title="Edit section: IGP (9000 series)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models are manufactured with a 150&#160;nm fabrication process</li>
<li>All models include Direct3D 8.1 and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 1.4</li>
<li>Based on the Radeon 9200</li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_R300_series">Radeon R300 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=13" title="Edit section: Radeon R300 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span id="AGP_.289000_series.2C_X1000_series.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="AGP_(9000_series,_X1000_series)">AGP (9000 series, X1000 series)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=14" title="Edit section: AGP (9000 series, X1000 series)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R300_series" title="Radeon R300 series">Radeon R300 series</a></div>

<h4><span id="PCI-E_.28X3xx.2C_X5xx.2C_X6xx.2C_X1000_series.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="PCI-E_(X3xx,_X5xx,_X6xx,_X1000_series)">PCI-E (X3xx, X5xx, X6xx, X1000 series)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=15" title="Edit section: PCI-E (X3xx, X5xx, X6xx, X1000 series)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R300_series" title="Radeon R300 series">Radeon R300 series</a></div>
<ul><li>All models include Direct3D 9.0 and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 2.0</li>
<li>All models use a PCI-E x16 interface</li></ul>

<h4><span id="IGP_.28X2xx.2C_11xx_series.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(X2xx,_11xx_series)">IGP (X2xx, 11xx series)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=16" title="Edit section: IGP (X2xx, 11xx series)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id="Radeon_X700_.26_X800_series"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_X700_&amp;_X800_series">Radeon X700 &amp; X800 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=17" title="Edit section: Radeon X700 &amp; X800 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span id="IGP_.28X12xx.2C_21xx.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(X12xx,_21xx)">IGP (X12xx, 21xx)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=20" title="Edit section: IGP (X12xx, 21xx)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_R400_series" title="Radeon R400 series">Radeon R400 series</a></div>
<ul><li>All models include Direct3D 9.0b and <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 2.0</li>
<li>Based on Radeon X700</li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_X1000_series">Radeon X1000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=21" title="Edit section: Radeon X1000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_X1000_series" title="Radeon X1000 series">Radeon X1000 series</a></div>
<ul><li>Note that ATI X1000 series cards (e.g. X1900) don't have Vertex Texture Fetch, hence they do not fully comply with the VS 3.0 model. Instead, they offer a feature called "Render to Vertex Buffer (R2VB)" that provides functionality that is an alternative Vertex Texture Fetch.</li></ul>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center;">

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_3000_series">Radeon HD 3000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=23" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 3000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_3000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_3000)">IGP (HD 3000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=24" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 3000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/AMD_700_chipset_series#Integrated_graphics" title="AMD 700 chipset series">AMD 700 chipset series</a></div>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
<br /><sup>2</sup> The clock frequencies may vary in different usage scenarios, as <a href="/wiki/ATI_PowerPlay" class="mw-redirect" title="ATI PowerPlay">ATI PowerPlay</a> technology is implemented. The clock frequencies listed here refer to the officially announced clock specifications.
<br /><sup>3</sup> The sideport is a dedicated memory bus. It is preferably used for a <a href="/wiki/Frame_buffer" class="mw-redirect" title="Frame buffer">frame buffer</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="All-in-Wonder_series">All-in-Wonder series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=25" title="Edit section: All-in-Wonder series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/All-in-Wonder" title="All-in-Wonder">All-in-Wonder</a></div>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Code name
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fabrication_process" class="mw-redirect" title="Fabrication process">Fab</a> (nm)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus interface
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core clock (MHz)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Memory clock (MHz)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core config<sup>1</sup>
</th>
<th colspan="3"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a>
</th>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
<br /><sup>2</sup> The effective data transfer rate of GDDR5 is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.
<br /><sup>3</sup> The TDP is reference design TDP values from AMD. Different non-reference board designs from vendors may lead to slight variations in actual TDP.
<br /><sup>4</sup> All models feature <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder" title="Unified Video Decoder">UVD2</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/ATI_PowerPlay" class="mw-redirect" title="ATI PowerPlay">PowerPlay</a>.
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_4000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_4000)">IGP (HD 4000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=27" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 4000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/AMD_700_chipset_series#Integrated_graphics" title="AMD 700 chipset series">AMD 700 chipset series</a> and <a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_1" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 1</a></div>
<ul><li>All Radeon HD 4000 IGP models include Direct3D 10.1 and OpenGL 2.0<sup id="cite_ref-39" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-39">&#91;28&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>
<br /><sup>2</sup> The clock frequencies may vary in different usage scenarios, as <a href="/wiki/ATI_PowerPlay" class="mw-redirect" title="ATI PowerPlay">ATI PowerPlay</a> technology is implemented. The clock frequencies listed here refer to the officially announced clock specifications.

</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_5000_series">Radeon HD 5000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=28" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 5000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_5000_series" title="Radeon HD 5000 series">Radeon HD 5000 series</a> and <a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_2" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 2</a></div>
<ul><li>The HD5000 series is the last series of AMD GPUs which supports two analog <a href="/wiki/Cathode_ray_tube" class="mw-redirect" title="Cathode ray tube">CRT</a>-monitors with a single graphics card (i.e. with two RAM-DACs) <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">AMD Eyefinity</a> introduced.</li></ul>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_5xxx&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_5xxx" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 5xxx"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_5xxx&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 5xxx (page does not exist)"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_5xxx&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-a-40"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-a_40-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-a_40-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-TDP-41"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-TDP_41-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-TDP_41-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">The TDP is reference design TDP values from AMD. Different non-reference board designs from vendors may lead to slight variations in actual TDP.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Eyefinity-42"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Eyefinity_42-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">All chips feature <i><a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">AMD Eyefinity</a></i>, but the Radeon HD 5870 Eyefinity Edition card also have six <a href="/wiki/Mini_DisplayPort" title="Mini DisplayPort">mini DisplayPort</a> outputs, all of which can be simultaneously active.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_6000_series">Radeon HD 6000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=29" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 6000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_6000_series" title="Radeon HD 6000 series">Radeon HD 6000 series</a> and <a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_3" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 3 (VLIW4)</a></div><p>• The Radeon HD 6000 series has a new tesselation engine which is said to double the performance when working with tesselation compared to the previous HD 5000 series.
</p><table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align: center">

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Desktop)" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Desktop)"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Desktop)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Desktop) (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Desktop)&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-44"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_44-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-45"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_45-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-46"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_46-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-47"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_47-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with DDR memory.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-48"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_48-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_6000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_6000)">IGP (HD 6000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=30" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 6000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models feature the UNB/MC Bus interface</li>
<li>All models do <b>not</b> feature double-precision FP</li>
<li>With driver Update OpenGL 4.4 available (Last Catalyst 15.12). OpenGL 4.5 available with Crimson Beta (driver version 15.30 or higher).</li>
<li>All models feature Angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3, and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">AMD Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li>
<li>All models feature 3D Blu-ray Disc acceleration.</li></ul>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxxD&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxxD" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 6xxxD"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxxD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 6xxxD (page does not exist)"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxxD&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>
<ul><li>Embedded GPU's as part of AMD's <a href="/wiki/List_of_AMD_accelerated_processing_units#Lynx:_&quot;Llano&quot;_(2011)" title="List of AMD accelerated processing units">Lynx</a> platform APU's.</li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_7000_series">Radeon HD 7000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=31" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 7000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_7000_series" title="Radeon HD 7000 series">Radeon HD 7000 series</a>, <a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_2" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 2 (VLIW5)</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next" title="Graphics Core Next">Graphics Core Next</a></div> <div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxx&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxx" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 7xxx"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxx" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 7xxx"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxx&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align: center">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br />(<a href="/wiki/Codename" class="mw-redirect" title="Codename">Codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br /><a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br />Die Size
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup id="cite_ref-boost_52-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-52">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-texture_fill_53-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-53">&#91;b&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_54-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-54">&#91;c&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2">Processing power<sup id="cite_ref-boost_52-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-52">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FLOPS_55-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-55">&#91;d&#93;</a></sup><br />(<a href="/wiki/GFLOPS" class="mw-redirect" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>

<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup id="cite_ref-boost_52-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-52">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-texture_fill_53-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-53">&#91;b&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_54-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-54">&#91;c&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2">Processing power<sup id="cite_ref-boost_52-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-52">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FLOPS_55-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-55">&#91;d&#93;</a></sup><br />(<a href="/wiki/GFLOPS" class="mw-redirect" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="4">Memory<sup id="cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_56-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-56">&#91;e&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2">TDP (<a href="/wiki/Watt" title="Watt">Watts</a>)
</th></tr></tbody></table>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-52"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_52-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-53"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_53-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_53-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-54"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_54-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_54-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-55"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_55-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_55-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-56"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_56-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_56-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with DDR memory.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-57"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_57-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_57-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_7000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_7000)">IGP (HD 7000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=32" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 7000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models feature the UNB/MC Bus interface</li>
<li>All models do <b>not</b> support double-precision FP</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_2" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 2 (VLIW5)</a> based APUs feature angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3, and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/TeraScale_(microarchitecture)#TeraScale_3" title="TeraScale (microarchitecture)">TeraScale 3 (VLIW4)</a> based APUs feature angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3.2, and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to four outputs.</li></ul>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxxD&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxxD" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 7xxxD"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxxD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 7xxxD (page does not exist)"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_7xxxD&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_8000_series">Radeon HD 8000 series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=33" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 8000 series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main articles: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_8000_series" title="Radeon HD 8000 series">Radeon HD 8000 series</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#first" title="Graphics Core Next">Graphics Core Next §&#160;first</a></div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_8xxx&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-63"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_63-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-64"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_64-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_64-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-65"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_65-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_65-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-66"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_66-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_66-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-67"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_67-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_67-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as with DDR memory.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-68"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_68-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_68-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />

</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br />&amp;&#160;Die Size
</th>
<th>Config<sup id="cite_ref-cconfig_74-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-cconfig-74">&#91;e&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th>Clock<sup id="cite_ref-boost_70-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-70">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Hertz" title="Hertz">MHz</a>)

</th>
<th>Pixel (<a href="/wiki/Pixel" title="Pixel">GP</a>/s)
</th>

</th>

</th>
<th>Bus&#160;type<br />&amp;&#160;width

<th>Size (<a href="/wiki/Mebibyte" class="mw-redirect" title="Mebibyte">MiB</a>)
</th>
<th>Clock (<a href="/wiki/Transfer_(computing)" title="Transfer (computing)">MT/s</a>)
</th>
<th>Band-<br />width (<a href="/wiki/Gigabyte" title="Gigabyte">GB</a>/s)
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><abbr title="Typical board power">TBP</abbr>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus interface
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup id="cite_ref-boost_70-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-70">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-texture_fill_71-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-71">&#91;b&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_72-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-72">&#91;c&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2">Processing power<sup id="cite_ref-boost_70-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-70">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FLOPS_73-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-73">&#91;d&#93;</a></sup><br />(<a href="/wiki/GFLOPS" class="mw-redirect" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="4">Memory
</th></tr></tbody></table>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_200" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx 200"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_200&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx 200 (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_200&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-70"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_70-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-71"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_71-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_71-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-72"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_72-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_72-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-73"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_73-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_73-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Fused_multiply%E2%80%93add" class="mw-redirect" title="Fused multiply–add">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-74"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_74-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_74-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-89"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-89">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The R9 285 utilizes loss-less colour compression which can increase effective memory performance (relative to GCN 1<sup>st</sup> gen and 2<sup>nd</sup> gen cards) in certain situations.<sup id="cite_ref-Hexus_R9_285_86-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Hexus_R9_285-86">&#91;44&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-88" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-88">&#91;46&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-290/290X_base_clock-93"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-290/290X_base_clock_93-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-290/290X_base_clock_93-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Base clock of <b>R9 290</b> and <b>R9 290X</b> will maintain at 947&#160;MHz and 1000&#160;MHz before reaching 95&#160;°C, respectively.<sup id="cite_ref-92" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-92">&#91;49&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_300" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx 300"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_300&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx 300 (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_300&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-97"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_97-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-98"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_98-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_98-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-99"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_99-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_99-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-100"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_100-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_100-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation. Double precision performance of <b>Hawaii</b> cards is 1/8 of single precision performance, for the other it is 1/16 of single precision performance.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-101"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_101-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_101-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-memory-108"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-memory_108-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The R9 380 utilizes loss-less color compression which can increase effective memory performance (relative to GCN 1<sup>st</sup> gen and 2<sup>nd</sup> gen cards) in certain situations.<sup class="noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact" style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" title="Wikipedia:Citation needed"><span title="This claim needs references to reliable sources. (June 2016)">citation needed</span></a></i>&#93;</sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 0px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_400" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx 400"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_400" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx 400"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_400&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-116"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_116-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_116-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_116-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-117"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_117-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-118"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_118-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-119"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_119-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-120"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_120-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-136"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-136">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/GlobalFoundries" title="GlobalFoundries">GlobalFoundries</a>' <a href="/wiki/14_nm" class="mw-redirect" title="14 nm">14&#160;nm</a> 14LPP <a href="/wiki/FinFET" title="FinFET">FinFET</a> process is <a href="/wiki/Second_source" title="Second source">second-sourced</a> from <a href="/wiki/Samsung_Electronics" title="Samsung Electronics">Samsung Electronics</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GF-Samsung_135-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GF-Samsung-135">&#91;80&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_500" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx 500"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_500" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx 500"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_500&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-142"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_142-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_142-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_142-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-143"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_143-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-144"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_144-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-145"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_145-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-146"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_146-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-153"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-153">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/GlobalFoundries" title="GlobalFoundries">GlobalFoundries</a>' <a href="/wiki/14_nm" class="mw-redirect" title="14 nm">14&#160;nm</a> 14LPP <a href="/wiki/FinFET" title="FinFET">FinFET</a> process is <a href="/wiki/Second_source" title="Second source">second-sourced</a> from <a href="/wiki/Samsung_Electronics" title="Samsung Electronics">Samsung Electronics</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GF-Samsung_135-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GF-Samsung-135">&#91;80&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-560s-162"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-560s_162-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-560s_162-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">In October 2017 AMD branded an additional Polaris chip as "RX 560", although it features less shader and texture mapping units than the first released RX 560.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-169"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-169">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">GlobalFoundries' <a href="/w/index.php?title=12_nm&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="12 nm (page does not exist)">12&#160;nm</a> 12LP process is based on Samsung's 14<span class="nowrap">&#160;</span>nm 14LPP process.<sup id="cite_ref-GF-Samsung_135-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GF-Samsung-135">&#91;80&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-170"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_170-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_170-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_170-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-171"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_171-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-172"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_172-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-173"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_173-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-174"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_174-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-179"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-179">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/GlobalFoundries" title="GlobalFoundries">GlobalFoundries</a>' <a href="/wiki/14_nm" class="mw-redirect" title="14 nm">14&#160;nm</a> 14LPP <a href="/wiki/FinFET" title="FinFET">FinFET</a> process is <a href="/wiki/Second_source" title="Second source">second-sourced</a> from <a href="/wiki/Samsung_Electronics" title="Samsung Electronics">Samsung Electronics</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GF-Samsung_135-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GF-Samsung-135">&#91;80&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 0px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_5000" title="Template:AMD Radeon RX 5000"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_RX_5000" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon RX 5000"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_5000&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-192"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_192-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_192-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_192-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-193"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_193-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-194"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_194-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-195"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_195-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-196"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_196-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-220"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_220-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-221"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_221-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-222"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_222-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-223"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_223-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-224"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_224-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray Accelerators</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Mobile_GPUs">Mobile GPUs</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=42" title="Edit section: Mobile GPUs">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Such chips are either soldered to the mainboard or to some <a href="/wiki/Mobile_PCI_Express_Module" title="Mobile PCI Express Module">Mobile PCI Express Module (MXM)</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Rage_Mobility_series">Rage Mobility series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=43" title="Edit section: Rage Mobility series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_252-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-253"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_253-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-254"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_254-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single Precision performance is calculated from the core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-255"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_255-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_6000.29_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_6000)_2">IGP (HD 6000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=52" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 6000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models feature the UNB/MC <a href="/wiki/Computer_bus" class="mw-redirect" title="Computer bus">Bus</a> <a href="/wiki/I/O_interface" class="mw-redirect" title="I/O interface">interface</a></li>
<li>All models do <b>not</b> feature double-precision FP</li>
<li>All models feature Angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3, and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li></ul>
<div style="clear:both;"></div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist" style="position: relative; bottom: -11px;"><span>[&#8201;<span class="noprint plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;veaction=edit"><span title="Edit this template with the VE. (Doesn&#39;t work if new wikitext mode is enabled.)">VisualEditor</span></a></span>&#8201;] </span><ul class="navbar-brackets"><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)" title="Template:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Ultra-mobile)"><span title="View this template">view</span></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon HD 6xxx (Ultra-mobile) (page does not exist)"><span title="Discuss this template">talk</span></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_HD_6xxx_(Ultra-mobile)&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">edit</span></a></li></ul></div>

<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_6000G.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_6000G)">IGP (HD 6000G)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=53" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 6000G)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>All models include <a href="/wiki/Direct3D" title="Direct3D">Direct3D</a> 11, <a href="/wiki/OpenGL" title="OpenGL">OpenGL</a> 4.4 and <a href="/wiki/OpenCL" title="OpenCL">OpenCL</a> 1.2</li>
<li>All models feature the UNB/MC <a href="/wiki/Computer_bus" class="mw-redirect" title="Computer bus">Bus</a> <a href="/wiki/I/O_interface" class="mw-redirect" title="I/O interface">interface</a></li>
<li>All models do not feature double-precision FP</li>
<li>All models feature Angle independent anisotropic filtering, UVD3 and <a href="/wiki/AMD_Eyefinity" title="AMD Eyefinity">Eyefinity</a> capabilities, with up to three outputs.</li>
<li>All models feature VLIW5</li></ul>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 80%; text-align:center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model

</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core config<sup>1</sup>

<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/AMD_Fusion" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Fusion">Fusion_APU</a>
</th></tr>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_HD_7000M_series">Radeon HD 7000M series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=54" title="Edit section: Radeon HD 7000M series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_HD_7000_series" title="Radeon HD 7000 series">Radeon HD 7000 series</a></div>

<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-a-268"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-a_268-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>

<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-269"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_269-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h4><span id="IGP_.28HD_7000G.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="IGP_(HD_7000G)">IGP (HD 7000G)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=55" title="Edit section: IGP (HD 7000G)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
