<li id="cite_note-boost-271"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_271-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-272"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_272-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-273"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_273-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-274"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_274-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-GDDR5_transfer_rate-275"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-GDDR5_transfer_rate_275-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-276"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_276-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-282"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_282-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-283"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_283-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-284"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_284-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-285"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_285-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_286-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx" title="Template:AMD Radeon Rx M4xx"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Rx M4xx (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Rx_M4xx&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-290"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_290-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-291"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_291-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-292"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_292-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-293"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_293-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-294"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_294-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<th style="background: #ececec; color: black; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: middle; text-align: left;" class="table-rh">Radeon<br />RX 580X<sup id="cite_ref-328" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-328">&#91;208&#93;</a></sup><br />(Polaris 20 XT)
</th>
<td><span data-sort-value="000000002018-04-11-0000" style="white-space:nowrap">11 April 2018</span>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-310"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_310-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-311"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_311-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-312"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_312-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-313"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_313-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-314"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_314-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-344"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_344-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_344-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_344-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-345"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_345-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-346"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_346-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-347"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_347-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-348"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_348-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: left;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 0px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M" title="Template:AMD Radeon RX 6000M"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon RX 6000M"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_RX_6000M&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-order-353"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-order_353-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Ordering for names is based on CU count followed by clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-boost-354"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_354-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-355"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_355-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-356"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_356-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-357"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_357-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-358"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_358-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Ray_tracing_(graphics)" title="Ray tracing (graphics)">Ray Accelerators</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>&#160;: Compute Units

<h3><span id="FirePro_Workstation_series_.28Wx000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Workstation_series_(Wx000)">FirePro Workstation series (Wx000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=70" title="Edit section: FirePro Workstation series (Wx000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">&#91;275&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">&#91;276&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">&#91;277&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_D-Series">FirePro D-Series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=71" title="Edit section: FirePro D-Series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<table class="box-Expand_section plainlinks metadata ambox mbox-small-left ambox-content" role="presentation"><tbody><tr><td class="mbox-image"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg" class="image"><img alt="[icon]" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/20px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="14" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/30px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1c/Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w_cropped.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="31" /></a></td><td class="mbox-text"><div class="mbox-text-span">This section <b>needs expansion</b>. You can help by <a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=">adding to it</a>.  <span class="date-container"><i>(<span class="date">June 2019</span>)</i></span></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>In 2014, AMD released the D-Series specifically for <a href="/wiki/Mac_Pro" title="Mac Pro">Mac Pro</a> workstations.<sup id="cite_ref-421" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-421">&#91;285&#93;</a></sup>

<h3><span id="FirePro_Workstation_series_.28Wx100.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Workstation_series_(Wx100)">FirePro Workstation series (Wx100)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=72" title="Edit section: FirePro Workstation series (Wx100)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">&#91;275&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">&#91;276&#93;</a></sup> OpenCL 2.1 and 2.2 possible for all OpenCL 2.0-Cards with Driver Update in Future (Khronos). Linux Support for OpenCL is limited with AMDGPU Driver 16.60 actual to Version 1.2.<sup id="cite_ref-amd.com1_425-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com1-425">&#91;289&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">&#91;277&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro_WX_x100">Radeon Pro WX x100</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=74" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro WX x100">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>4th Quarter 2016 Launch by AMD
</p>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Pro" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon Pro">AMD Radeon Pro</a></div>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher.<sup id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">&#91;277&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-435"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_435-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-436"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_436-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-437"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_437-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-438"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_438-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-439"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_439-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Double-440"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Double_440-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">To calculate driver enabled FP64 processing power see <a href="/wiki/Radeon_Pro#Driver" title="Radeon Pro">driver</a>.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Vega_series">Radeon Vega series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=75" title="Edit section: Radeon Vega series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/Radeon_Pro#Radeon_Vega_Frontier_Edition" title="Radeon Pro">Radeon Pro §&#160;Radeon Vega Frontier Edition</a></div>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher.<sup id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">&#91;277&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<li id="cite_note-boost-469"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_469-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-470"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_470-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-471"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_471-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-472"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_472-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-473"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_473-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_Vega_II&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:AMD Radeon Pro Vega II (page does not exist)"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Pro_Vega_II&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Pro Vega II (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_Vega_II&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-484"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_484-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-485"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_485-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-486"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_486-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-487"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_487-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-488"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_488-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-490"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_490-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-491"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_491-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-492"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_492-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-fixed-494"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-7"><sup><i><b>h</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fixed_494-8"><sup><i><b>i</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shader</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a>: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-unified-504"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-unified_504-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Mobile_series">FirePro Mobile series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=80" title="Edit section: FirePro Mobile series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br />(<a href="/wiki/Codename" class="mw-redirect" title="Codename">Codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br />(<a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup id="cite_ref-texture_fill_507-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-507">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_508-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-508">&#91;b&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Processing power<sup id="cite_ref-FLOPS_509-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-509">&#91;c&#93;</a></sup><br />(<a href="/wiki/GFLOPS" class="mw-redirect" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="4">Memory
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus interface
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Notes
</th></tr>
<tr>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-507"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_507-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-508"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_508-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-509"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_509-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Single precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-510"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_510-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro">Radeon Pro</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=81" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096"/><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="/wiki/AMD_Radeon_Pro" class="mw-redirect" title="AMD Radeon Pro">AMD Radeon Pro</a></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro_WX_mobile_series">Radeon Pro WX mobile series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=82" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro WX mobile series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Half Precision Power (FP16) is equal single precision power (FP32) in 4th GCN Generation (in 5th Gen: Half Precision (FP16) = 2x SP (FP32))</li></ul>
<table class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br />(<a href="/wiki/Codename" class="mw-redirect" title="Codename">Codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br />(<a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br />Die Size
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup id="cite_ref-boost_536-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-536">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-texture_fill_537-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-537">&#91;b&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_538-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-538">&#91;c&#93;</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="2">Processing power<sup id="cite_ref-boost_536-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-boost-536">&#91;a&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FLOPS_539-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-539">&#91;d&#93;</a></sup><br />(<a href="/wiki/GFLOPS" class="mw-redirect" title="GFLOPS">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="4">Memory
</th>
<th rowspan="2">TDP (<a href="/wiki/Watt" title="Watt">W</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus interface
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Release Price (USD)
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th>Config<sup id="cite_ref-cconfig_540-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-cconfig-540">&#91;e&#93;</a></sup>
</th>

<li id="cite_note-boost-536"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_536-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-537"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_537-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-538"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_538-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-539"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_539-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-540"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_540-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a>&#160;: Compute Units </span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="Template:AMD Radeon Pro 500 Series"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Pro 500 Series (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_500_Series&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-561"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_561-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-562"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_562-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-563"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_563-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-564"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_564-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-565"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_565-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Pro_5000M_series">Radeon Pro 5000M series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=86" title="Edit section: Radeon Pro 5000M series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<table class="wikitable center" style="font-size: 85%;">
<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br />(<a href="/wiki/Codename" class="mw-redirect" title="Codename">Codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Release Date
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br />&amp;&#160;<a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br />&amp;&#160;Die Size
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series" class="mw-redirect" title="Template:AMD Radeon Pro 5000M Series"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Pro 5000M Series (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Pro_5000M_Series&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-584"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_584-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-585"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_585-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Texture Mapping Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-586"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_586-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <b>Render Output Units</b> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-587"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_587-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-588"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_588-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div> 
<p><br />
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>&#160;: compute units

</p>
<h3><span id="FirePro_Server_series_.28S000x.2FSxx_000.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="FirePro_Server_series_(S000x/Sxx_000)">FirePro Server series (S000x/Sxx 000)</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=90" title="Edit section: FirePro Server series (S000x/Sxx 000)">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>Vulkan 1.0 and OpenGL 4.5 possible for GCN with Driver Update FirePro equal to Radeon Crimson 16.3 or higher.<sup id="cite_ref-Geeks3D_Vulkan_411-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Geeks3D_Vulkan-411">&#91;275&#93;</a></sup> OpenGL 4.5 was only in Windows available.<sup id="cite_ref-khronos.org_412-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-khronos.org-412">&#91;276&#93;</a></sup> Actual Linux Driver support OpenGL 4.5 and Vulkan 1.0, but only OpenCL 1.2 by AMDGPU Driver 16.60.<sup id="cite_ref-amd.com1_425-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com1-425">&#91;289&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>Vulkan 1.1 possible for GCN with Radeon Pro Software 18.Q1.1 or higher. It might not fully apply to GCN 1.0 or 1.1 GPUs.<sup id="cite_ref-18.Q1.1_413-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18.Q1.1-413">&#91;277&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<br /><sup>3</sup> OpenGL 4.4: support with AMD FirePro driver release 14.301.000 or later, in footnotes of specs<sup id="cite_ref-amd.com_420-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-amd.com-420">&#91;284&#93;</a></sup>
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>&#160;: compute units
<br /><sup>2</sup> The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Radeon_Instinct_series">Radeon Instinct series</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units&amp;action=edit&amp;section=92" title="Edit section: Radeon Instinct series">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini" style="float: right;position: relative;top: -15px;right: 5px;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:AMD_Radeon_Instinct" title="Template:AMD Radeon Instinct"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template_talk:AMD_Radeon_Instinct&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template talk:AMD Radeon Instinct (page does not exist)"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:AMD_Radeon_Instinct&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist reflist-lower-alpha">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-boost-636"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-boost_636-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Boost values (if available) are stated below the base value in <i>italic</i>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-texture_fill-637"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-texture_fill_637-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Texture fillrate is calculated as the number of <i>texture mapping units</i> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-pixel_fill-638"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pixel_fill_638-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Pixel fillrate is calculated as the number of <i>render output units</i> multiplied by the base (or boost) core clock speed.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FLOPS-639"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FLOPS_639-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Precision performance is calculated from the base (or boost) core clock speed based on a <a href="/wiki/Multiply%E2%80%93accumulate_operation#Fused_multiply–add" title="Multiply–accumulate operation">FMA</a> operation.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cconfig-640"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-cconfig_640-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified Shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture Mapping Units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render Output Units</a> and <a href="/wiki/Graphics_Core_Next#Compute_units" title="Graphics Core Next">Compute Units (CU)</a></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<p><br />
</p>

<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_Shader_Model" class="mw-redirect" title="Unified Shader Model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Render_output_unit" title="Render output unit">Render output units</a>&#160;: compute units
<br /><sup>2</sup> The effective data transfer rate of <a href="/wiki/GDDR5" class="mw-redirect" title="GDDR5">GDDR5</a> is quadruple its nominal clock, instead of double as it is with other DDR memory.
</p>

</th></tr></tbody></table>
<p><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Pixel_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Pixel shader">Pixel shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Vertex_shader" class="mw-redirect" title="Vertex shader">Vertex shaders</a>&#160;: <a href="/wiki/Texture_mapping_unit" title="Texture mapping unit">Texture mapping units</a>&#160;: Render output units
<br />
<sup>2</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: Texture mapping units&#160;: Render output units <br />
<sup>4</sup> <a href="/wiki/Unified_shader_model" title="Unified shader model">Unified shaders</a>&#160;: Texture mapping units&#160;: Render output units&#160;: RT Cores
</p><p><sup>3</sup> 12.8&#160;GB/s texture bandwidth. 9.6&#160;GB/s framebuffer and Z-buffer bandwidth.
</p>
<ul><li>The Latte looks similar to the RV730 used in the Radeon HD4650/4670.<sup id="cite_ref-eurogamer.net_686-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eurogamer.net-686">&#91;488&#93;</a></sup> Although It's an even closer possibly exact specification match to the HD5550 as it has exactly the same clock, number of Shaders, Texture mapping units &amp; Render Outputs<sup id="cite_ref-687" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-687">&#91;489&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<li><a href="/wiki/Apple_M1" title="Apple M1">Apple M1</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/Video_Core_Next" title="Video Core Next">Video Core Next</a>, AMD's video core which combines the functionality of <a href="/wiki/Video_Coding_Engine" title="Video Coding Engine">Video Coding Engine</a> and <a href="/wiki/Unified_Video_Decoder" title="Unified Video Decoder">Unified Video Decoder</a></li></ul>

<li id="cite_note-tomshardware_radeon_vii-189"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-tomshardware_radeon_vii_189-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFLiu2019" class="citation news cs1">Liu, Zhiye (14 January 2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.tomshardware.com/news/amd-radeon-vii-double-precision-disabled,38437.html">"AMD Radeon VII Will Ship Without Double-Precision"</a>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">16 January</span> 2019</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=AMD+Radeon+VII+Will+Ship+Without+Double-Precision&amp;rft.date=2019-01-14&amp;rft.aulast=Liu&amp;rft.aufirst=Zhiye&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tomshardware.com%2Fnews%2Famd-radeon-vii-double-precision-disabled%2C38437.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+AMD+graphics+processing+units" class="Z3988"></span></span>

Retrieved <span class="nowrap">16 January</span> 2019</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=AMD+Radeon+VII&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.techpowerup.com%2Fgpu-specs%2Fradeon-vii.c3358&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+AMD+graphics+processing+units" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-ryan_smith_radeon_vii_fp64-191"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-ryan_smith_radeon_vii_fp64_191-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFRyan_Smith_&#91;@RyanSmithAT&#93;2019" class="citation web cs1">Ryan Smith [@RyanSmithAT] (16 January 2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://twitter.com/RyanSmithAT/status/1085680805802733568">"Alright, I finally have the Radeon VII FP64 performance matter sorted out with AMD. Contrary to earlier statements, it is being throttled. Radeon VII's rate will be 1:8, versus Vega 20's native 1:2 rate. Notably, this is still twice the native FP64 rate of all other Vegas"</a> (Tweet) &#8211; via <a href="/wiki/Twitter" title="Twitter">Twitter</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Alright%2C+I+finally+have+the+Radeon+VII+FP64+performance+matter+sorted+out+with+AMD.+Contrary+to+earlier+statements%2C+it+is+being+throttled.+Radeon+VII%27s+rate+will+be+1%3A8%2C+versus+Vega+20%27s+native+1%3A2+rate.+Notably%2C+this+is+still+twice+the+native+FP64+rate+of+all+other+Vegas.&amp;rft.date=2019-01-16&amp;rft.au=Ryan+Smith+%5B%40RyanSmithAT%5D&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FRyanSmithAT%2Fstatus%2F1085680805802733568&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+AMD+graphics+processing+units" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-678"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-678">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFHagedoorn2013" class="citation news cs1">Hagedoorn, Hilbert (July 1, 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.guru3d.com/news_story/ms_now_confirms_directx_11_2_is_a_windows_8_1_exclusive.html">"MS now Confirms DirectX 11.2 is a Windows 8.1 Exclusive"</a>. <i>The Guru of 3D</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130704182014/http://www.guru3d.com/news_story/ms_now_confirms_directx_11_2_is_a_windows_8_1_exclusive.html">Archived</a> from the original on July 4, 2013<span class="reference-accessdate">.
